name: Deck Demonica
description:
Deck Demonica

This is my submission to Mini Jam 69 (nice), be it a little later than intended. All art/code/music done solo.

Fight your way though hordes of monsters for the privilege of collecting powerful cards to aide you along your way.

(In case it doesn't come across, the anvil every 4 levels allows you to upgrade cards by walking up and pressing "e"). Currently you must re-equip your cards after visiting the anvil. (AND YOU GET MORE SLOTS EACH LOOP)

Sorry, no web build :( . It's already chugging enough in standalone.
